description: Type the reading for vocabulary words in the HSK 4 word list.

deck.question: 按照
deck.comment: according to; in accordance with; in light of

deck.question: 抱
deck.comment: to hold; to hug; carry in one's arms; to cradle

deck.question: 抱歉
deck.comment: be sorry; feel apologetic; to regret

deck.question: 比如
deck.comment: for example; for instance; such as

deck.question: 遍
deck.comment: a time; everywhere; turn; (mw for times or turns)

deck.question: 不得不
deck.comment: have to; have no choice but to; cannot but

deck.question: 不管
deck.comment: no matter (what, how, etc.); regardless of

deck.question: 擦
deck.comment: to wipe; to rub; to polish

deck.question: 参观
deck.comment: to visit (a place, such as a tourist spot); inspect

deck.question: 长江
deck.comment: the Yangtze River; the Changjiang River

deck.question: 场
deck.comment: courtyard; place; field; (mw for games, performances, etc.)

deck.question: 吃惊
deck.comment: be startled; be shocked; be amazed

deck.question: 打扮
deck.comment: dress up; put on make up

deck.question: 戴
deck.comment: put on; to wear; to respect

deck.question: 当
deck.comment: should; act as; work as; manage; match; (sound of bells)

deck.question: 到处
deck.comment: everywhere; in all places; all over

deck.question: 到底
deck.comment: after all; in the end (used in a question)

deck.question: 倒
deck.comment: to collapse; to fall; fail; to exchange | to pour; contrary to expectations

deck.question: 对面
deck.comment: opposite; across from; the other side

deck.question: 对于
deck.comment: regarding; as far as sth. is concerned; with regards to; for

deck.question: 份
deck.comment: part; portion; (mw for documents, papers, jobs, etc.)

deck.question: 符合
deck.comment: in keeping with; in accordance with; conform

deck.question: 干杯
deck.comment: to drink a toast; cheers!; bottoms up!

deck.question: 感觉
deck.comment: to feel; become aware of; feeling

deck.question: 干
deck.comment: to concern; shield; dry; clean (Kangxi radical 51)

deck.question: 刚
deck.comment: just (indicating the immediate past); recently; firm

deck.question: 光
deck.comment: light; ray; bright; only; merely; used up

deck.question: 逛
deck.comment: to stroll; to visit; go window shopping

deck.question: 及时
deck.comment: timely; in time; promptly; without delay

deck.question: 继续
deck.comment: to continue; to go on; to proceed

deck.question: 减肥
deck.comment: go on a diet; lose weight

deck.question: 交
deck.comment: deliver; turn over; intersect; to pay (money); friendship

deck.question: 交流
deck.comment: communicate; exchange; give and take; interaction; to alternate

deck.question: 骄傲
deck.comment: proud; arrogant; conceited; take pride in

deck.question: 接着
deck.comment: continue; carry on; to catch; follow

deck.question: 节
deck.comment: section; part; festival; moral integrity; save; (mw for class periods)

deck.question: 尽管
deck.comment: despite; although; even though | freely; without hesitation

deck.question: 竟然
deck.comment: unexpectedly; to one's surprise; go so far as to

deck.question: 究竟
deck.comment: after all; when all is said and done; actually

deck.question: 举行
deck.comment: convene; to hold (a meeting, ceremony, etc.)

deck.question: 拒绝
deck.comment: to refuse; to decline; to reject

deck.comment: hold a meeting; get together; a party

deck.question: 开玩笑
deck.comment: joke; play a joke; make fun of

deck.question: 开心
deck.comment: feel happy; have a great time; make fun of somebody

deck.question: 可惜
deck.comment: it's a pity; regrettable; too bad

deck.question: 恐怕
deck.comment: be afraid; to fear; I'm afraid that...

deck.question: 拉
deck.comment: to pull; to play (string instruments); to drag

deck.question: 来不及
deck.comment: there's not enough time (to do something); it's too late

deck.question: 留
deck.comment: to leave (behind, a message); to retain; to stay

deck.question: 难道
deck.comment: could it be that ...?; don't tell me ...

deck.question: 偶尔
deck.comment: occasionally; once in a while; sometimes

deck.question: 篇
deck.comment: sheet; (mw for articles); piece of writing

deck.question: 平时
deck.comment: ordinarily; in normal times; in peacetime

deck.question: 千万
deck.comment: ten million; be sure to; must

deck.question: 缺少
deck.comment: to lack; be short of; be deficient in

deck.question: 任务
deck.comment: a mission; an assignment; a task

deck.question: 甚至
deck.comment: even (to the point of); so much so that

deck.question: 剩

deck.question: 实在

deck.question: 使

deck.question: 使用
deck.comment: to use; employ; apply; administer; manipulate

deck.question: 收拾
deck.comment: to tidy; put in order; to repair; to settle with; punish

deck.question: 首先
deck.comment: first (of all); in the first place; firstly

deck.question: 受到
deck.comment: receive (influence, restriction, etc.); be subjected to

deck.question: 输
deck.comment: to transport; to lose (a game, etc.)

deck.question: 顺便
deck.comment: conveniently; in passing; on the way

deck.question: 顺利
deck.comment: go smoothly; without a hitch; successful

deck.question: 死
deck.comment: to die; dead; fixed; impassible; extremely

deck.question: 随便
deck.comment: as one pleases; informal; random; casual

deck.question: 随着
deck.comment: along with; in the wake of

deck.question: 台
deck.comment: platform; Taiwan (abbr.); desk; stage; typhoon; (mw for machines); (classical) you (in letters)

deck.question: 抬
deck.comment: to lift; to raise (with both palms up); carry (together)

deck.question: 躺
deck.comment: recline; lie down (on back or side)

deck.question: 讨论
deck.comment: to discuss; discussion; to talk over

deck.question: 提
deck.comment: to carry; to lift; to raise (an issue)

deck.question: 提前
deck.comment: shift to an earlier date; bring forward; to advance

deck.question: 提醒
deck.comment: remind; call attention to; warn of

deck.question: 填空
deck.comment: fill in the blanks; fill a vacancy

deck.question: 停
deck.comment: to stop; to halt; to park (a car)

deck.question: 挺
deck.comment: straighten up; stick out; rather (good); very

deck.question: 通过
deck.comment: by means of; through (a method); pass through; via

deck.question: 推
deck.comment: to push; to scrape; to decline; postpone; elect

deck.question: 脱
deck.comment: to shed; take off; to escape

deck.question: 往往
deck.comment: often; frequently; more often than not

deck.question: 无论
deck.comment: no matter what; regardless of whether...

deck.question: 响
deck.comment: make a sound; to ring; echo

deck.question: 行
deck.comment: walk; be current; do; will do; okay

deck.question: 修理
deck.comment: to repair; perform maintenance; to overhaul

deck.question: 呀
deck.comment: ah; oh; (used for 啊 after words ending with a, e, i, o, or ü)

deck.question: 演出
deck.comment: to act (in a play); to perform; to put on a show; performance

deck.question: 以
deck.comment: to use; according to; so as to; for; by

deck.question: 因此
deck.comment: therefore; thus; that is why; because of this

deck.question: 引起
deck.comment: give rise to; lead to; to cause; arouse

deck.question: 赢
deck.comment: to win; to beat; to profit

deck.question: 应聘
deck.comment: accept a job offer; to apply for a job

deck.question: 优点
deck.comment: merit; good point; a strength; a benefit

deck.question: 由于
deck.comment: due to; owing to; as a result of; thanks to

deck.question: 与
deck.comment: (formal) and; to give; together with; participate; final particle expressing doubt or surprise

deck.question: 预习
deck.comment: (of students) prepare a lesson before class; preview

deck.question: 原来
deck.comment: original; former; as it turns out

deck.question: 招聘
deck.comment: recruitment; take job applications for a job

deck.question: 整理
deck.comment: put in order; arrange; straighten up; to tidy; to pack (luggage)

deck.question: 正好
deck.comment: just (in time); just right; just enough; happen to; by chance

deck.question: 支持
deck.comment: sustain; hold out; | support; stand by (e.g. international support)

deck.question: 只要
deck.comment: so long as; if only; provided that

deck.question: 指
deck.comment: finger; to point (at, to, out); refer to

deck.question: 专业
deck.comment: profession; specialized field of study; major

deck.question: 转
deck.comment: to turn; to change; pass on | revolve; rotate

deck.question: 最好
deck.comment: the best; had better ...; it would be best

deck.question: 尊重
deck.comment: esteem; to respect; to value; to honor

deck.question: 左右
deck.comment: about; approximate; around | left and right

deck.question: 座
deck.comment: (mw for mountains, bridges, tall buildings, etc.); | seat; base; stand; constellation
